title: My pixel 3xl was not detected in bootloader
content:
I just bought 2nd hand pixel 3xl. and i found out that the bootloader is unlock. i decided to flash factory image and re-lock the bootloader. When i run "fastboot devices" none of my device appeared(already in bootloader state). I try to turn on my device and put into usb debugging mode. When i type "adb devices" in cmd is shown that my devices is detected. how to make it detected in "fastboot device" too?

*i already installed latest driver.
